shut_microwave_door.description: Close the rotation microwave door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_shut_door.description: Clean the opened door of the microwave

close_then_clean.description: Close the microwave's door and clean it

open_microwave_door.description: Open the microwave by swinging the door on its hinge.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed door of the microwave

open_then_clean.description: Open the microwave's door and clean it

press_button.description: Press the button to turn on the microwave.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to ensure it functions correctly.

press_then_clean.description: Press the button to turn on the microwave and then clean it

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the microwave body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_microwave_interior.description: Clean the interior of the microwave, including the door and body.

full_clean.description: Clean the entire microwave including the door, body, and button.
